meta.article_title: May 10, 2021 - How to Play a Player Who Attacks With Long Pips

debutant: Take a step off the table, and return with a topspin drive of some sort either offensively or defensively
Stay at the table, open your racket, and be willing to lose a number of points as you get used to countering their attacks

exercices_complementaires.description: Keep the ball deep and put no spin on it.
Put topspin on the ball and return with a drive of some sort either offensively or defensively.

metriques_progression: Get used to countering their attacks
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't be afraid to lose a number of points as you get used to countering their attacks
